{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Single-board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = FriendlyARM |model = NanoPi K |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 2 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Amlogic;S905; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G0846E-BCMA; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = B2:C0:A5 |oui = B0:F1:EC
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2015.01;-00013-gc9be30f; |stockos = Linux;3.14.29;Android 6.0.1;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, eMMC module socket, MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 5 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 4 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes, 3.3V TTL, 4-pin header, populated, (115200 8N1), |jtag = none,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.0, Bluetooth 4.0, IR receiver, I2S, I2C, SPDIF, GPIO, |addchip = 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8097;;3;,,, 3A, 1.2MHz Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;MPS;MP2143;;1;,,, Ultra low dropout, 500mA, CMOS LDO;Will Semiconductor;WL2803E;;2;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;1;,,, Microprocessor Supervisory Circuit;Maxim Integrated;MAX809R;;1;,,, 300mA Dual LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9011;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Ubuntu, Armbian,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2017 |estprice = 40 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0723CJK7R |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6212 |rad1modif = SD (solder down) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43430; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|NanoPi series|Amlogic|AMPAK|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Amlogic]]'' S905 Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A53 (@1.5GHz) *GPU: ''Mali-450MP'' (OpenGL ES3.1, OpenVG1.1, OpenCL, DX11, AFBC) *Memory: 2GB DDR3 @912MHz *Onboard Storage: TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot, eMMC module socket *Wi-Fi: [[AMPAK]] ([[Broadcom]] BCM43430) â€¢ [http://wiki.friendlyarm.com/wiki/images/5/57/AP6212_V1.1_09022014.pdf Datasheet]
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.friendlyarm.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_K2 ''NanoPi K2'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/video-focused-hacker-sbc-mimics-rpi-3-and-odroid-c2/ ''Video-focused hacker SBC mimics RPi 3 and Odroid-C2'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/04/13/40-nanopi-k2-board-is-powered-by-amlogic-s905-processor/ ''$40 NanoPi K2 Board Powered by Amlogic S905'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
